pageContext.claim: “Just spoke to King Salman of Saudi Arabia and explained to him that, because of the turmoil & disfunction in Iran and Venezuela, I am asking that Saudi Arabia increase oil production, maybe up to 2,000,000 barrels, to make up the difference...Prices to high! He has agreed!”
pageContext.analysis: Oil prices have risen because Trump pulled the United States out of the Iran nuclear deal and imposed sanctions on Iran's oil sector, not because of "turmoil & dysfunction" in that country.
